tool_description: Synchronizes multiple audio tracks by detecting timing offsets and aligning them for coherent multi-track playback and editing.

track_ids.description: Array of track IDs to synchronize

reference_track.description: Track ID to use as timing reference (first track if not specified)

error_messages: Invalid track IDs: Ensure all track_ids exist and are valid.
Too few tracks: Provide at least 2 tracks for synchronization.
Reference track not found: The specified reference_track ID does not exist in track_ids.
Synchronization failed: Unable to detect reliable timing alignment between tracks.
Invalid sync method: Use one of [cross_correlation, phase_correlation, manual].
usage: Provide array of track_ids to synchronize. Optionally specify reference_track, sync_method, tolerance_ms, and auto_align settings.

sync_group_id.description: Identifier for the synchronized track group

offsets_ms.description: Timing offset corrections applied to each track in milliseconds
